document.full_text: nasdaq omx and intercontinentalexchange bid $11.3 billion for nyse euronext in an effort to trump deutsche boerse's deal, and pushed their case with an appeal to u.s. patriotism.
document.title: nasdaq, ice bid to snatch nyse from germans
